bug.author: tdwalton
bug.summary: [BUG] Pwnagotchi service fails to start if plugins encounter an error.
bug.description:
Describe the bug Failure in a plugin causes pwnagotchi service to go into a restart loop. Discovered because the wpa-sec plugin couldn't find a /root/handshakes folder on booting a new pwnagotchi, and fixed by creating said folder, but I suspect other plugin failures would exhibit similar behavior. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Boot pwnagotchi with v1.0.0RC1 release image edit /etc/pwnagotchi/config.yml to enable wpa-sec plugin sudo systemctl restart pwnagotchi
Expected behavior Pwnagotchi service would restart and run with new config options.
